QuestData.Title: The Heavens Hum With War
QuestData.Description: The mantid don't ever make my job easy, but now they've gone too far.$b$bWe can fend off the occasional attack from Kor'vess, but now... now they're starting to surround us. What's worse, they're draining the amber from our tree.$b$bThis will not stand! We need that amber! To make beer!$b$bThey've dug a burrow into the south side of the tree. I'm short-handed here. Could you take care of them for me?
QuestData.CompletionText: Azzix, his name was. I think. Azzix K'tai.
QuestData.RewardText: We're not here to hurt anybody. We just want to make a little bit of brew out of this tree sap. Is that too much to ask?
